title: My Shop
body: Ayyy is it possible to get a refreshed My Shop? I know it may be a dumb question, but I was really hoping for skins that I can buy since none of the recent skins are really for me, you know? I need a hero, I'm holding out for a hero 'til the end of the night.

replies.body:
http://i.giphy.com/QwH7v7J1tBrq0.gif

Ayyyyy my bruh, no worries. it looks like there were some minor issues with the personal shop at first so it was taken down. When it comes back up, you should have all new offers!! You're going to be getting a personal shop refresh without even having to ask xD!
Thank you, All Might(y) hero! Here's to hoping there are some sweet offers for me to snag this time.
